string-array.name: bus_travel_tips
string-array.item: Reserve tickets ahead for the best deals and assured seating.
Carry only what\'s necessary to avoid clutter and for ease of movement.
Choose layers and comfy clothing to adjust to temperature changes.
Have books, music, or movies ready for on-the-go entertainment.
Bring along snacks and drinks to avoid hunger or thirst.
Keep your valuables in a secure, personal bag.
Make sure your electronics are fully charged before departing.
Plan to arrive at the station well before your departure time.
Consider a travel pillow and earplugs for overnight or long rides.
Stay aware of your itinerary, stops, and transfers.
